title: Crab Rangoon with Water Chestnuts
ingredients: 2 (6 ounce) cans crabmeat, drained and flaked
2 tablespoons water chestnuts, drained and chopped
method: Step 1: Heat oil to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) in a large, heavy saucepan.
Step 2: Mix cream cheese, crabmeat, water chestnuts, garlic powder, and paprika together in a medium bowl.
Step 3: Place about 1 teaspoon cream cheese mixture in the center of each wonton wrapper. Moisten wrapper edges with water, fold over the mixture, and pinch to seal.
Step 4: Working in small bathces, fry wontons until golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes.
